00030         struct ErrorNoStartWriting: public Writable, public Readable {
00031             void write(Writer*w) const throw (WritingException) {
00032                 //w->startWriting("ErrorNoStartWriting");
00033                 w->doneWriting();
00034             }
00035             
00036             void read(Reader*r) throw (ReadingException) {
00037                 r->startReading("ErrorNoStartWriting");
00038                 r->doneReading();
00039             }
00040         };

00093         struct ErrorWrongType1: public Writable, public Readable {
00094             int i;
00095             ErrorWrongType1(int i=3):i(i){}
00096             
00097             void write(Writer*w) const throw (WritingException) {
00098                 w->startWriting("ErrorWrongType1");
00099                     w->write_i32(i, "i");
00100                 w->doneWriting();
00101             }
00102             
00103             void read(Reader*r) throw (ReadingException) {
00104                 r->startReading("ErrorWrongType1");

00163         struct ErrorWrongMemberClass: public Writable, public Readable {
00164             IntWrapper a,b; EmptyClass s;
00165             ErrorWrongMemberClass(int a=1,int b=2):a(a),b(b) {}
00166             
00167             void write(Writer*w) const throw (WritingException) {
00168                 w->startWriting("ErrorWrongMemberClass");
00169                     w->writeObject(true, &a, "a");
00170                     w->writeObject(false, &s, "s");
00171                 w->doneWriting();
00172             }
00173             
00174             void read(Reader*r) throw (ReadingException) {
00175                 r->startReading("ErrorWrongMemberClass");
00176                     r->readObject( &s, "s");
00177                     r->readObject( &a, "a");
00178                 r->doneReading();
00179             }
00180         };
